channel.title: "Failed to start game with shared content. Please update these games first:"
channel.description:
"Failed to start game with shared content. Please update these games first: Source SDK 2007"
Black Mesa has worked fine up until now. How do I resolve this issue? How do I update Source SDK? All my other Source games seem to work fine...

item.title: "Failed to start game with shared content. Please update these games first:"
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
Next to the search bar in Steam, you need to press Games and select Tools. Then install Source SDK Base 2007.

Read full topic
item.source: "Failed to start game with shared content. Please update these games first:"
